short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes all sublist headers so that they are still visible while scrolling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever dream of sticky headers when encountering a long sublist in NetSuite?! This extension will fix the headers so that they are visible while scrolling!
